description: When darkness descends, Miami lights up. Inspired by Magic City's glittering waterfront, this adidas Inter Miami CF away jersey enchants with pink details and an undulating graphic. Created to keep soccer fans comfortable, it combines smooth fabric and moisture-wicking AEROREADY. The back neck signoff displays the team's aspirational motto. Made with 100% recycled materials, this product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
name: Messi #10 Inter Miami CF 23/24 Away Jersey
